Building the PCB

The PCB is the substrate on which the switches are connected. It hosts the microcontroller, the LEDs and any other features you with to add. It also provides a mechanical connection between the switches, and can make a board more stiff. You will have control over every aspect of this circuit borad, and you can tailor it to your liking.
